data.Title: Google to Release New Core Update in Coming Weeks
data.Description: Google has announced that a new core update will be coming in the coming weeks. The last core update was the March 2024 core update, and many sites are still waiting since September 2023 to see helpful content recoveries.

data.Title: Google Search Notes Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google is ending its experiment with Notes on Search. The feature, which was part of Google Search Labs, allowed users to add notes to search results. Google says that it has seen in its research that people want to hear from others like them and Notes was an exploration into that.

data.Title: Google Testing New Search Results Page Design
data.Description: Google Search is testing highlighting words in blue in the search results and using light background colors. This is likely part of Google's ongoing efforts to improve the visual presentation of search results.

data.Title: Google Business Profiles Discontinues Chat Feature
data.Description: Google Business Profiles' new chat feature is no longer working. Users are reporting that they are unable to start new chats. Google has not yet commented on the issue.

data.Title: Google May Allow Publishers to Exclude Content from Discover
data.Description: Google may give publishers a way to exclude some of their content from Google Discover. This would give publishers more control over how their content is surfaced in Discover.

data.Title: Google's Project Astra: A Universal AI Agent Coming Soon?
data.Description: Google's Project Astra (a universal AI agent) could arrive by the end of the year.

data.Title: Anthropic Releases Claude App for Android
data.Description: Anthropic releases Claude app for Android. Users will be able to sync their conversations with Claude across devices and upload photos or files to the app for real-time image analysis.

data.Title: YouTube Music Tests AI-Generated Conversational Radio
data.Description: YouTube Music is testing a new feature called "AI-generated conversational radio" in the US. The feature uses AI to create personalized radio stations based on users' listening habits and preferences.

data.Title: SpreadsheetLLM: A New LLM for Spreadsheet Analysis
data.Description: Microsoft researchers have unveiled SpreadsheetLLM, an encoding method designed to enable LLMs (large language models) to efficiently understand and analyze complex spreadsheet data.

data.Title: Google's Web Crawler Simulates "Idle" States for Better JavaScript Rendering
data.Description: Google's web crawler simulates "idle" states to better render JavaScript-heavy sites, improving indexing of deferred content on webpages.

data.Title: Google Confirms No Way to Block Content from Discover Feed
data.Description: Google has confirmed that, unlike the Google News feed, there is currently no method for website owners to block specific content from appearing in the Google Discover feed.

data.Title: Google's June 2024 CrUX Data Shows Performance Gains
data.Description: Google's June 2024 CrUX data shows performance gains which are expected to inform the Page Experience Ranking Factor

data.Title: Google Tests Renaming "Short Videos" to "Quick Takes"
data.Description: Google testing renaming "short videos" to "quick takes".

data.Title: Google Ads Renames Broad Match to Intent Match in Japan
data.Description: Google Ads renamed broad match to intent match only in Japan.

data.Title: Google Tests Query Refinements for Ad Carousel Placements
data.Description: Google testing query refinements for ad carousel placements.

data.Title: Google Knowledge Panels Now Display Store Ratings
data.Description: Google knowledge panels with store ratings (not local stars).

data.Title: Google May Have Site-Level AI Content Classification Score
data.Description: Google may have a site-level AGC (auto-generated content) artificially generated AI classification score. This score could be used to identify and potentially penalize sites that are using AI to generate content.
